channel.title: CVE Feed for Clibo Manager -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Clibo Manager -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9198|2024-09-26T09:49:35.882Z -- clibo%20manager -- clibo%20manager
item.description: Vulnerability in Clibo Manager v1.1.9.1 that could allow an attacker to execute an stored Cross-Site Scripting (stored XSS ) by uploading a malicious .svg image in the section: Profile > Profile picture.

item.title: CVE-2024-9199|2024-09-26T09:50:58.163Z -- clibo%20manager -- clibo%20manager
item.description: Rate limit vulnerability in Clibo Manager v1.1.9.2 that could allow an attacker to send a large number of emails to the victim in a short time, affecting availability and leading to a denial of service (DoS).
